articles.title: ITV This Morning's Alison Hammond apologises as she breaks 'presenting 101' rule during serious phone-in - Manchester Evening News

articles.content: Alison Hammond was left issuing an apology to viewers after she suffered an awkward blunder during a serious phone-in. The 47-year-old was back at the helm of the ITV daytime show on Friday alongside… [+2685 chars]

articles.title: Anna Delvey clears up confusion over German heiress rumour following Inventing Anna dramatisation - The Independent
articles.description: ‘No one introduces themselves like that,’ said the convicted scammer
articles.content:
Anna Delvey has cleared up the confusion surrounding speculation that she posed as a German heiress.
The true story of Delvey (real name Anna Sorokin) reached worldwide audiences when it became the … [+2050 chars]
